protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for prokineticin 2. Exclusively coupled to the G(q) subclass of heteromeric G proteins. Activation leads to mobilization of calcium, stimulation of phosphoinositide turnover and activation of p44/p42 mitogen-activated protein kinase

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Lin DC, Bullock CM, Ehlert FJ, Chen JL, Tian H, Zhou QY: Identification and molecular characterization of two closely related G protein-coupled receptors activated by prokineticins/endocrine gland vascular endothelial growth factor. J Biol Chem. 2002 May 31;277(22):19276-80. Epub 2002 Mar 8.
